rrdworld.name: BBStatus
rrdworld.author: Victor Tarhon-Onu
rrdworld.description: BBStatus is an IP accounting and a SNMP and IP monitoring tool for Linux (for now). It uses RRDTool (RRDs PERL module) to display traffic statistics and data gathered by SNMP. It also provides user based access, so each user can log in and visualize various data (depending on access rights).
